title: Diamond Pendant - Lightweight Addigai Vattilu Design
materials: G-H color). Crafted with a special Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This delicate pendant features a Vattilu (bowl) design, reimagined for modern tastes. The intricate filigree showcases the brilliance of the diamonds. The delicate hanging gold balls give it movement and add to its traditional charm.
colors: Classic gold hue complemented by the dazzling white sparkle of diamonds
occasions: from everyday elegance to special occasions like weddings or festivals. Can be effortlessly paired with a simple gold chain for a contemporary look or added to a traditional Haaram for a grand statement. Ideal for a seemantham or any family function.
description: A perfect blend of tradition and modernity. Lightweight and easy to wear, yet possessing a timeless design that will be treasured for generations. The brilliance of the diamonds combined with the richness of the gold makes it a truly special piece. Crafted with the meticulous attention to detail synonymous with Hyderabad's renowned jewelry artisans.
